com.android.widget

类 Adapter<T,VH extends Adapter.ViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.android.widget.Adapter<T,VH>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class Adapter<T,VH extends Adapter.ViewHolder>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
